title: Provide Detailed Product Specifications
description: A retailer is considering a new product and requests a detailed specification sheet.

tasks.description: Identify the product the retailer is asking about.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the product in the catalog.

tasks.description: Retrieve the official product specification sheet from the document management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the PDF spec sheet.

tasks.description: Send the specification sheet to the retailer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully emails the document to the retailer.
